name: PongCraft LD41
description:
PongCraft is an Arcade-Strategy game where the purpose of the game is to destroy the other’s base. Pong mechanics are used to colect gold and wood. Gold is used to summon warriors and wood to repair base. It works for two players or single player vs AI.

Instructions:

Humans:

  • A to move up
  • Z to move down
  • S to summon militia(cost 5 gold)

Orcs:

  • UP to move up
  • DOWN to move down
  • RIGHT to summon a grunt(cost 5 gold)

Tips:

  • At 10 Gold a Champion will automatically be summoned.
  • At 50 Wood the base will be healed if possible.
  • Click left side of screen for two players.
  • Click right side of screen for Single player.
  • Hitting mines on some angles will give you a bonus amount.
  • Losing the ball will lose your gold.
  • Soldiers damage the opponent's base(and cannot be stopped).

I worked alone with these tools:

  • Language: HTML5
  • Framework: PhaserJS
  • Graphics: Piskel
